pinyin: dao4 gao1 yi4 an1 , shi4 gao1 yi4 wei1

definitions.dao4 gao1 yi4 an1 , shi4 gao1 yi4 wei1: More moral strength increases one's safety, more power and influence increases one's danger (idiom, from Records of the Historian 史記|史记). cf Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it (William Pitt the Elder, 1770).;
